duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct sales activities with prospective and current customers over the phone to identify their insurance needs, and offer solutions that address those needs.
Provide excellent customer service and follow defined quality and productivity standards, deadlines, and established procedures.
Demonstrate knowledge of outbound call center best practices, such as quality control and workforce management.
Possess an active resident state life insurance license and be open to learning about our life insurance product portfolio and distribution process.

education_certification.credential: Active resident state life insurance license
